name: trackmap-app
description: TrackMap Application - Documentation and audit tools for GA4 tracking

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start -w frontend" "npm run start -w bff" "npm run start -w trackdoc" "npm run start -w trackaudit"
scripts.backend: concurrently "cd services/bff && npm run dev" "cd services/trackdoc && npm run dev" "cd services/trackaudit && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w bff && npm run build -w trackdoc
scripts.test: npm test -w bff && npm test -w trackdoc && npm test -w trackaudit

author: Flavien
